localization_keys_used_in_pricing_py.description: All localization keys used in app/handlers/admin/pricing.py. Add these to your locale JSON files (en.json, fa.json, etc.)

ADMIN_PRICING_CANCEL_KEYWORD.description: Localized cancel keyword for user input (e.g., 'cancel')

ADMIN_PRICING_TRIAL_TRAFFIC_LIMIT_LABEL.description: Label for trial traffic limit setting

ADMIN_PRICING_TRIAL_DEVICE_LIMIT_LABEL.description: Label for trial device limit setting

ADMIN_PRICING_TRIAL_PAYMENT_ENABLED_LABE.description: Label for trial payment enabled toggle

ADMIN_PRICING_TRIAL_PAYMENT_ENABLED_DESC.description: Description for trial payment enabled setting
ADMIN_PRICING_TRIAL_PAYMENT_ENABLED_DESC.default_en: When enabled, the configured amount is charged during trial activation.

ADMIN_PRICING_TRIAL_ACTIVATION_PRICE_LAB.description: Label for trial activation price setting

ADMIN_PRICING_TRIAL_ACTIVATION_PRICE_DES.description: Description for trial activation price setting

ADMIN_PRICING_TRIAL_ADD_REMAINING_LABEL.description: Label for add remaining trial days setting
ADMIN_PRICING_TRIAL_ADD_REMAINING_LABEL.default_en: ‚ûï Add remaining trial days to paid plan

ADMIN_PRICING_TRIAL_ADD_REMAINING_DESCRI.description: Description for add remaining trial days setting
ADMIN_PRICING_TRIAL_ADD_REMAINING_DESCRI.default_en: When enabled, remaining trial days are added to paid subscription duration.

ADMIN_PRICING_CORE_BASE_SUBSCRIPTION_PRI.description: Label for base subscription price setting

ADMIN_PRICING_CORE_PROMO_DISCOUNTS_ENABL.description: Label for promo discounts enabled toggle
Description for promo discounts enabled setting
ADMIN_PRICING_CORE_PROMO_DISCOUNTS_ENABL.default_en: Enables base discounts for promo group periods.

ADMIN_PRICING_CORE_DEFAULT_DEVICE_LIMIT_.description: Label for default device limit setting

ADMIN_PRICING_CORE_DEFAULT_TRAFFIC_LIMIT.description: Label for default traffic limit setting

ADMIN_PRICING_CORE_RESET_TRAFFIC_LABEL.description: Label for reset traffic on payment toggle

ADMIN_PRICING_CORE_TRAFFIC_RESET_STRATEG.description: Label for traffic reset strategy setting
Description for traffic reset strategy setting
ADMIN_PRICING_CORE_TRAFFIC_RESET_STRATEG.default_en: Available values: DAY, WEEK, MONTH, NEVER.

ADMIN_PRICING_CORE_TRAFFIC_SELECTION_MOD.description: Label for traffic selection mode setting

ADMIN_PRICING_CORE_TRAFFIC_SELECTION_SEL.description: Label for selectable traffic mode option

ADMIN_PRICING_CORE_TRAFFIC_SELECTION_FIX.description: Label for fixed traffic mode option

ADMIN_PRICING_CORE_TRAFFIC_SELECTION_MOD.description: Description for traffic selection mode setting
ADMIN_PRICING_CORE_TRAFFIC_SELECTION_MOD.default_en: Defines whether users pick packages or use a fixed limit.

ADMIN_PRICING_CORE_FIXED_TRAFFIC_LIMIT_L.description: Label for fixed traffic limit setting

ADMIN_PRICING_CORE_FIXED_TRAFFIC_LIMIT_D.description: Description for fixed traffic limit setting
ADMIN_PRICING_CORE_FIXED_TRAFFIC_LIMIT_D.default_en: Used only in fixed traffic mode. 0 = unlimited.

ADMIN_PRICING_PERIOD_SUFFIX_SHORT.description: Short suffix for period display (e.g., 'd' for days)

ADMIN_PRICING_PERIOD_DAYS.description: Label for multiple days period (use {days} placeholder)

ADMIN_PRICING_TRAFFIC_FORMAT.description: Format for traffic display (use {gb} and {unit} placeholders)

ADMIN_PRICING_SUMMARY_ITEM.description: Format for summary item (use {label} and {price} placeholders)

ADMIN_PRICING_PERIOD_OPTIONS_SUMMARY.description: Format for period options summary (use {subs} and {renew} placeholders)

ADMIN_PRICING_SETTING_TOGGLE_STATEFUL.description: Format for toggle button with state (use {icon} and {label} placeholders)

ADMIN_PRICING_SETTING_EDIT_WITH_VALUE.description: Format for edit button with value (use {label} and {value} placeholders)

ADMIN_PRICING_SECTION_PROMPT.description: Prompt for selecting what to update

ADMIN_PRICING_SECTION_EMPTY.description: Message when no parameters are available

ADMIN_PRICING_SECTION_TRAFFIC_OPTIONS_AC.description: Format for active packages list (use {items} placeholder)

ADMIN_PRICING_SECTION_TRAFFIC_OPTIONS_PR.default_en: Tap a package to toggle its visibility.

ADMIN_PRICING_SECTION_PERIOD_OPTIONS_SUB.description: Format for active subscription periods (use {items} placeholder)

ADMIN_PRICING_SECTION_PERIOD_OPTIONS_REN.description: Format for active renewal periods (use {items} placeholder)

ADMIN_PRICING_SECTION_PERIOD_OPTIONS_PRO.default_en: Tap a period to toggle its visibility.

ADMIN_PRICING_MENU_DESCRIPTION.default_en: Quick access to subscription plans, traffic bundles and extra services.

ADMIN_PRICING_MENU_SUMMARY_TRIAL.description: Format for trial summary in menu (use {summary} placeholder)

ADMIN_PRICING_MENU_SUMMARY_CORE.description: Format for core summary in menu (use {summary} placeholder)

ADMIN_PRICING_MENU_SUMMARY_PERIOD_OPTION.description: Format for period options summary in menu (use {summary} placeholder)

ADMIN_PRICING_MENU_SUMMARY_PERIODS.description: Format for periods summary in menu (use {summary} placeholder)

ADMIN_PRICING_MENU_SUMMARY_TRAFFIC.description: Format for traffic summary in menu (use {summary} placeholder)

ADMIN_PRICING_MENU_SUMMARY_EXTRA.description: Format for extras summary in menu (use {summary} placeholder)

ADMIN_PRICING_BUTTON_PERIOD_OPTIONS.description: Button label for period options section

ADMIN_PRICING_BUTTON_TRAFFIC_OPTIONS.description: Button label for traffic options section

ADMIN_PRICING_EDIT_TARGET.description: Label for current item in edit dialog

ADMIN_PRICING_EDIT_CURRENT.description: Label for current value in edit dialog

ADMIN_PRICING_EDIT_PROMPT.default_en: Enter a new price in RUB (e.g. 990 or 990.50). Use 0 for a free plan.

ADMIN_PRICING_EDIT_INVALID.description: Message when price input is invalid
ADMIN_PRICING_EDIT_INVALID.default_en: Could not parse the price. Please enter a number in RUB (e.g. 990 or 990.50).

ADMIN_PRICING_SETTING_PARAMETER.description: Label for parameter in setting edit dialog

ADMIN_PRICING_SETTING_CURRENT.description: Label for current value in setting edit dialog

ADMIN_PRICING_SETTING_FORMAT.description: Label for input format in setting edit dialog

ADMIN_PRICING_SETTING_EXAMPLE.description: Label for example in setting edit dialog

ADMIN_PRICING_SETTING_WARNING.description: Label for warning in setting edit dialog

ADMIN_PRICING_SETTING_PROMPT.default_en: Send a new value or type "Cancel". Use none to clear.

ADMIN_PRICING_SETTING_CANCEL_HINT.default_en: Reply "Cancel" to go back without changes.

ADMIN_PRICING_SETTING_INVALID.description: Message when setting value is invalid
ADMIN_PRICING_SETTING_INVALID.default_en: Could not update the parameter. Please check the value format.

ADMIN_PRICING_SETTING_SUCCESS.description: Format for successful setting update (use {label} and {value} placeholders)

ADMIN_PRICING_CHOICE_ALREADY.description: Message when choice option is already active

ADMIN_PRICING_CHOICE_UPDATED.description: Format for choice update confirmation (use {label} placeholder)

ADMIN_PRICING_TRAFFIC_PACKAGE_MIN.description: Message when trying to disable last traffic package
ADMIN_PRICING_TRAFFIC_PACKAGE_MIN.default_en: At least one package must remain.

ADMIN_PRICING_TRAFFIC_PACKAGE_ENABLED.description: Message when traffic package is enabled

ADMIN_PRICING_TRAFFIC_PACKAGE_DISABLED.description: Message when traffic package is disabled

ADMIN_PRICING_PERIOD_MIN.description: Message when trying to disable last period
ADMIN_PRICING_PERIOD_MIN.default_en: At least one period must remain.
